node.name: Sys::Hostname - Try every conceivable way to get hostname
node.description:
Attempts several methods of getting the system hostname and then caches the result. It tries [perlfunc:syscall|syscall], `hostname`, `uname -n`, and the file /com/host. If all that fails it [perlman:perlguts|perlguts]s.

All nulls, returns, and newlines are removed from the result.
